effect.shortEffect: Immunity to wind moves, raises attack.
effect.full: Wind Rider gives immunity to wind moves, and causes the Pokémon's Attack to increase by one stage when hit by one.

description.scarlet-violet: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat if Tailwind takes effect or if the Pokémon is hit by a wind move. The Pokémon also takes no damage from wind moves.
